definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: It is the one day in the year when most of us grow big of heart and broad of mind.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節是一年中大多數人心胸開闊，氣度非凡的一天。

sentences.english: Shanghai's great tolerance originates from its history of sufficient opening-up.
sentences.chinese: 上海恢宏的氣度源於充分開放的歷史。

sentences.english: Next, an analysis of Professor Hsiao's commentary style in annotating lyric is followed, so as to see his great learning and personality.
sentences.chinese: 再者，分析蕭先生的評賞風格，以見學人的襟懷氣度。

sentences.english: But later I knew that your bearing is far beyond my imagination.
sentences.chinese: 然而後來我才明白，你的氣度是遠超過我的想像的。

sentences.english: I did not have the black ink to help the main such bearing.
sentences.chinese: 我就沒有黑墨幫主那樣的氣度了。

sentences.english: So I know that my bearing is less than yours.
sentences.chinese: 所以我明白，我的氣度不如你。

sentences.english: All we need is enough patience and presence to read it.
sentences.chinese: 所有我們需要的就是足夠的閱讀它的耐心和氣度。

sentences.english: However, in artistic creation and teaching activities with inclusive tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 但在藝術創作和教學活動中具有兼容幷包的氣度。

sentences.english: Only the broad-minded, delicate features, can make more friends.
sentences.chinese: 只有心胸開闊，氣度恢宏的人，才能多交朋友。

sentences.english: The emperor he played was magnanimous.
sentences.chinese: 他扮演的古代皇帝氣度恢宏。

sentences.english: The golden tassels endow the pulpit with garishness and nobleness.
sentences.chinese: 金色的流蘇使整個講道壇富顯華貴，氣度不凡。

sentences.english: He looks distinguished in his custom-made suit.
sentences.chinese: 他穿上訂製的西服顯得氣度不凡。

sentences.english: His charming air arrested my attention.
sentences.chinese: 我被他的不凡氣度吸引了。

sentences.english: Astana’s architectural style can best be described as idiosyncratic.
sentences.chinese: 對阿斯塔納建築風格的最好描述就是氣度不凡。

sentences.english: What commands real respect is one's forbearing spirit, not power or money.
sentences.chinese: 真正叫人信服的是內在的氣度，而非權勢和金錢。

sentences.english: Tiger with the king of beasts, the penis and bearing a proudly.
sentences.chinese: 虎以百獸之王著稱，有着傲然的雄風與氣度。

definition: one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
charm or grace (in poetry or art)
